findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function allows unlimited token approval to any address without proper validation or access control.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function does not have sufficient access control, allowing unauthorized wallets to perform token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: Owner cannot mint tokens after initial contract creation/deployment.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The burn function does not have any protection or access control, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the contract's funds.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swap functions (swapExactTokensForTokens, swapTokensForExactTokens, swapExactETHForTokens, swapTokensForExactETH, swapExactTokensForETH, swapETHForExactTokens) are unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The skim function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The constructor function lacks protection, allowing it to be called multiple times and potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected deliver function
findings.description: The 'deliver' function is unprotected and can be exploited by an external attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromReward function
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function is unprotected and can be exploited to manipulate rewards.

findings.title: Unprotected includeInReward function
findings.description: The includeInReward function is declared as external and only accessible by the owner, but it lacks proper access control or validation, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Unprotected setTaxFeePercent function
findings.description: The setTaxFeePercent function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, allowing them to modify the tax fee percentage.

findings.title: Unprotected setLiquidityFeePercent function
findings.description: The setLiquidityFeePercent function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized changes to the liquidity fee percentage.

findings.title: Unprotected setMaxTxPercent function
findings.description: The setMaxTxPercent function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function
findings.description: The setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function does not have any protection or access control, allowing unauthorized users to increase the allowance.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function does not have sufficient protection against unauthorized access or malicious activities.
